table.name: civicrm_participant_status_type
table.comment: various types of CiviEvent participant statuses

field.name: name
field.comment: non-localized name of the status type

field.name: label
field.comment: localized label for display of this status type

field.name: class
field.comment: the general group of status type this one belongs to

field.name: is_reserved
field.comment: whether this is a status type required by the system

field.name: is_active
field.comment: whether this status type is active

field.name: is_counted
field.comment: whether this status type is counted against event size limit

field.name: is_expiring
field.comment: whether participant with this status type can expire
